io.orchestrate.client

Interface Client

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpClient

    public interface Client
    A client used to read and write data to the Orchestrate.io service.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Client.API
      The different versions of the Orchestrate.io service.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Client.API V0
      Initial API; has KV, Events, Search, and early Graph support.

        OrchestrateFuture<java.lang.Boolean> execute(DeleteOperation deleteOp)
        Executes the specified deleteOp on the Orchestrate.io service.
        Parameters:
        deleteOp - The delete operation to execute.
        Returns:
        A future for the response from this operation.

      • stop

        void stop()
          throws java.io.IOException

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If resources couldn't be stopped.
